ground module¶

class ground.Ground(image, pos)¶

Bases: pygame.sprite.Sprite

The surface on which players can stand.

Parameters:
  • Sprite – The reference of the sprite.
  • image – Image to use.
  • pos – Position of the ground.
update()¶

Update mask to compensate for explosions occuring.
